ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Just made level 26!
ygData.msgSnippet: OOO cool.. someone on bristlebane reads this... (Yes, Talies, I realize you are also on Bristlebane) I just hit 27, so I have been experimenting with charm...
ygData.messageBody:
OOO cool.. someone on bristlebane reads this... (Yes,
Talies, I realize you are also on Bristlebane)

I just hit 27, so I have been experimenting with
charm... Perhaps a bit of an unorthodox use but here
is what ive been doing.

I get on a list for a high keep group... Then for the
next 2 hours, I have to do something... So I either do
baking, brewing, or lately, I've taken to helping an
enchanter friend lvl (he hit 19 last night) We go to
orc side and stand a bit away from the crowd, when
something spawns and hits me first (has to hit me
otherwise my enchanter friends ethics cause him to
think we are ks'ing) I charm it /pet follow over to
the area away from the fighting. I then beat on it,
till three quarters dead (or keep it charmed so the
other ppl cant steal it...) and then my friend mem
blurs it and finishes it off.. Really slow because he
keeps giving the orcs away, so ppl wont think we are
ks'ing

--- Spz <spz@...> wrote:
> Hi Everyone!
>
> With the arrival of level 26 and Area effect Fear,
> my strategy will most
> likely change. I was thinking of using, Snare,
> Fear, Dot... and repeat
> the cycle.
>
> Also, since at 27 we get charm, what creature do you
> suggest I play with
> :)
>
> Thank you in advance,
>
> Fausse Note
> Level 26 Bard (Bristlebane)
>


=====
Harmonie MoonsongBard of the 26th chorusBristlebane serverhttp://www.geocities.com/harmoniemoonsong
